originalText.text: Horrible bedside manner and extremely dismissive. I did not feel respected or heard.

text.text: Horrible bedside manner and extremely dismissive. I did not feel respected or heard.

originalText.text: Dr. Mir is very knowledgeable in his field. I appreciate his holistic approach to battling inflammatory responses and autoimmune diseases. The staff is always welcoming and polite. His office is always clean. Never had to wait in the waiting room for more than 10 minutes. Would 100% recommend.

text.text: Dr. Mir is very knowledgeable in his field. I appreciate his holistic approach to battling inflammatory responses and autoimmune diseases. The staff is always welcoming and polite. His office is always clean. Never had to wait in the waiting room for more than 10 minutes. Would 100% recommend.

originalText.text:
I saw 2 other highly recommended NYC rheumatologists before I eventually found
Dr. Mir. When I met Dr. Mir nearly 4 years ago I was in severe pain and on medical disability. Dr. Mir was the only rheumatologist I’ve met who worked with me to create an effective and personalized treatment plan. He is incredibly patient, kind and constantly abreast of innovations in the autoimmune and integrated medicine world. I recommend him to anyone looking for a doctor who is motivated to not just serve medically but work to heal holistically. I’m forever grateful to him. I’ve been doing very well the last 3+ years, in large part thanks to him and the treatment plan he tailored to me and my needs.

originalText.text: Great Doctor and great staff in Manhattan office.  Very grateful for his expertise.

originalText.text: I choose to travel because it’s worth it. Hard to find someone balanced and understanding.
